ROW.DATDSC: select rn,guid,bilid,yymm,stat,tousr,subtyp,cmid,cmnam,town,chkdat,redat,dept,rar from ( select rownum rn,guid,bilid, yymm1||'~'||yymm2 yymm, --decode(stat,'1','未分派','2','已分派','3','已处理','9','已完成',stat) stat, a.stat||'.'||b.name stat, tousr, --decode(subtyp,'1','有电力无缴税','2','有缴税无电力','3','电力税负异常','4','行业税负异常','5','无电表号纳税','6','无企业电表号','7','电力税额异常',subtyp), c.name subtyp, cmid, cmnam, a.town, to_char(chkdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') chkdat, to_char(redat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') redat, (select name from v_depts d where a.todept=d.id) dept, '' rar from tax_trkhdr a,V_TAX_TRKSTAT b,v_tax_trktyp c where a.stat=b.id(+) and a.subtyp=c.id(+) and to_char(dat,'YYYY-MM')>=decode('[%DAT1]','','1900-01','[%DAT1]') and to_char(dat,'YYYY-MM')<=decode('[%DAT2]','','2900-01','[%DAT2]') --and stat like '[%STAT]%' [%STATSTR] and a.bilid like '[%BILID]%' and nvl(tousr,' ') like '[%TAXMAN]%' --MOREand a.todept in (select deptid from usr where org='[%SYS_ORGID]' and id='[%SYS_USRID]') and nvl(a.todept,' ') like '[%SWJG]%' and nvl(subtyp,' ') like '[%TYP]%' and nvl(typ,' ') like '[%TRKTYP]%' --and nvl(a.town,' ') like (select name from v_tax_elearea where id like '[%ELEAREA]')||'%' order by crtdat desc,bilid,tousr,stat ) order by rn
